title: Tony Monaco and Howard Paul - New Adventures
description:
Tony Monaco and Howard Paul - New Adventures

Tony Monaco and Howard Paul team up in a tribute to Jimmy Smith & Wes Montgomery.

Label: TMHP Records
Released: 2014

Tracklist:
01. Alone Together (6:10)
02. Days Of Wine And Roses (6:45)
03. Indonesian Nights (5:39)
04. Polka Dots & Moonbeams (8:01)
05. Rusty's Boogaloo (5:30)
06. The Way You Look Tonight (6:06)
07. Bewitched Bothered & Bewildered (5:27)
08. Just Friends (6:11)
09. Speak Low (7:59)
10. Blues For A.P. (6:24)

Total Time: 64:15

Format: MP3 320 kbit/s. All songs are tagged by the book.

----------------

Tony Monaco and Howard Paul team up in a tribute to Jimmy Smith & Wes Montgomery. Tony is an acknowledged master and internationally beloved Hammond jazz organist. Howard is a noted recording artist, lecturer, and most prominently known as President/CEO of Benedetto Guitars, Inc., one of the world's premier jazz guitar makers. They are joined by Jim Rupp, who's years of road work and recording with the bands of Wood Herman, Maynard Ferguson, Glenn Miller and Diane Schuur made him a most dynamic and swinging drummer. This is a O.G.D. trio with an authenticity rarely seen in the genre today.
